comments:
Sepcify a many to many mapping with the following for the JoinTable annotation. @JoinTable(name="FOO", joinColumns = {@JoinColumn})

Restart eclipse and you'll get exceptions trying to create th epersistence model.  you cannot view the persistence properties for the many-many mapping and the exception will continue to occur.
